item.title: Shantaya add a quote by Stendhal
item.description: "C'est la violente impression du laid sur une Ã¢me faite pour aimer ce qui est beau. " -- Stendhal

item.title: Shantaya add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Is it really so that the one I love is everywhere?" -- Rumi

item.title: Shantaya add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art." -- Rumi

item.title: Shantaya add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Whatever you are physically...male or female, strong or weak, ill or healthy--all those things matter less than what your heart contains. If you have the soul of a warrior, you are a warrior. All those other things, they are the glass that contains the lamp, but <i>you</i> are the light inside." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Shantaya add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Sometimes, when I have to do something I don't want to do, I pretend I'm a character from a book. It's easier to know what they would do." -- Cassandra Clare
